about_the_game:
Road Dealer is an exciting simulation game that puts you in the role of a shrewd car dealer. Your ultimate goal is to earn as much profit as possible by buying and selling used cars, but don't play fair. You deliberately buy old cars with hidden defects, repair them cosmetically and sell them to naive customers for exorbitant prices.



As you become more successful, customers begin to suspect that you are not being honest and become increasingly dissatisfied with their purchases. Your challenge is to keep them under control, avoiding their complaints and negative feedback, while still making a fortune.
To achieve your goals, you have a faithful friend - a dog - who will help you "calm down" disgruntled customers and hide lies.



Do you have what it takes to fool your customers and become the richest and most famous car dealer in town? Play "Road Dealer" now and find out!

short_description: Step into the shoes of a dishonest car dealer. Cheats customers by selling them damaged cars for a high price. In this mission, your loyal dog is invaluable in helping you repair everything that's broken and also deterring unhappy customers. Will you be able to become the king of car trading?
